meanings.definition: A liqueur flavored with the dried peel of bitter oranges.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a sip of curacoa after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed a cocktail with curacoa for the customer.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to try the exotic curacoa.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a hint of curacoa sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of curacoa filled the room, enticing guests.

meanings.sent1: The artist used curacoa paint to create a vibrant sky.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden were a beautiful shade of curacoa.
meanings.sent3: The curacoa of the ocean on a sunny day was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like curacoa gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The curacoa of the flag stood out against the clear sky.
